variable_webfonts.title: Variable Webfonts
variable_webfonts.description: Finally, you can use variable webfonts in Semplice! If bold feels too bold and regular feels too boring, you can now create the perfect in-between.

single_project.title: Single project module
single_project.description: Want more control over the layout of your projects? Want to add unique hovers to your project thumbnails?  Want to create a specific layout you can’t accomplish with the Portfolio Grid? Now you can. This is a big one from our Semplice family’s wishlist.
